data.meta_description: KKHSOU MBA Admission | Fee, Syllabus, Last Date: Guwahati's Krishna Kanta Handiqui State Open University. KKHSOU invites applications from candidates for
data.text:
KKHSOU MBA Admission | Fee, Syllabus, Last Date: Guwahati’s Krishna Kanta Handiqui State Open University. KKHSOU invites applications from candidates for admission to its two-year Master of Business Administration (MBA) program once a year. The duration of this degree program extends for two years in the full-time mode.

Latest Updates

Applicants will be able to apply to the KKHSOU MBA courses from January 2024.

KKHSOU MBA Admission 2024 Highlights:

Course Name [MBA] Master of Business Administration Duration 2 Years Course Type Post Graduation Eligibility Graduation Approx Fee Rs:-22000/- University Name Krishna Kanta Handique State Open University Approved By AICTE, NAAC, UGC University Type State University Founded 2005 Address Jalukbari, Guwahati, Assam 781014 University official Website http://www.kkhsou.in/

What is a KKHSOU MBA?

This course aims at making contributions through a comprehensive, utilized, and detailed examination of managers and entities. Also, it focuses on the growth of specialist, movable, and intelligent skills required for effective general and planning processes in personal, government, and 3rd agencies.

Eligibility Criteria

Indian

A bachelor’s degree is the requirement in the criteria that must hold a student while pursuing a minimum 50% score in this education.

NRI

KKHSOU provides MBA education to NRI students as well and requires them to submit their equivalence certificates.

KKHSOU MBA Application Form

Application charges at the KKHSOU are INR 300 which must be paid by each candidate. This fee can be submitted in person directly with a DD or using the online system.

How to apply online

Application in the online mode can be submitted through an online portal.

Go to the site with the link http://kkhsou.inand then to the admission menu.

The first step includes registration and with this step application form will be provided.

Candidates must provide their valid data and necessary documents.

Other than academic documents, a signature and photograph will be uploaded as well.

Pay the application cost and get its receipt, after this all submit the form.

KKHSOU MBA Syllabus 2024

Semester 1 S.No Name of subjects 1 Management Process and Organisational Behaviour 2 Managerial Economics 3 Accounting for Managers 4 Information Technology in Management

Semester 2 S.No Name of subjects 1 Human Resource Management 2 Financial Management 3 Marketing management 4 Legal Aspects of Business

Semester 3 S.No Name of subjects 1 Strategic for Management 2 Production And Operation Management 3 Business Research Methodology 4 Business Policy and Strategic Management

Semester 4 S.No Name of subjects In the 4th Semester, the learners have to select any one Specialisation 1 Finance Specialisation 2 Marketing Specialisation 3 Human Resource Management Specialisation

KKHSOU MBA Admission Process

Admission will be based on the entrance criteria.

Candidates must have to clear the entrance test.

Students must be required to apply for admission on the University website.

Merit list will be declared by the University.

The Qualified students will be applicable admission.

Required Documents for Admission
